headline: Greta: James W. Foley Legacy Fund rises above evil
subHeadline: Greta's 'Off the Record' commentary, 9/12/14: In the midst of immense grief, the parents of the American journalist murdered by ISIS find it within themselves to do good for others. #JamesFoley

utterances.speaker: DIANE FOLEY
utterances.sentences: It's interesting how, you know, how his faith was, you know, helped him a lot.

utterances.speaker: JOHN FOLEY
utterances.sentences: You can't do this on true grit.

utterances.speaker: JOHN FOLEY
utterances.sentences: You cannot do it on true grit.

utterances.speaker: DIANE FOLEY
utterances.sentences: Jim wasn't a holy kid, OK? Jim was just a good kid. You know, he had goodness about him. That's what Daniel said about Jim. Jim had pure goodness. He had a big laugh. He believed in people. And I think that's where he met God in a way in that goodness. You will see much more from our interview with the Foleys right here, ON THE RECORD at 7:00 p.m. Eastern. That's my "Off the Record" comment tonight.
